## getJavaVersion() function

Get the version of a Java executable.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getJavaVersion(javaExec: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  javaExec | string | Java executable |

<b>Returns:</b>
